explains: vt. 平息；去掉……的雷管；使除去危险性

sentences.en: Local police are trying to defuse racial tension in the community.
sentences.cn: 当地的警察竭力缓和这个社区种族间的紧张局面。

sentences.en: Police administrators credited the organization with helping defuse potentially violent situations.
sentences.cn: 警方赞扬该组织帮助缓和潜在的暴力情势。

sentences.en: That could help defuse the barrage of lawsuits facing it.
sentences.cn: 上市同时可以缓解目前面临的法律诉讼。
